Package net.minecraftforge.client.event

Class GuiScreenEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.GuiScreenEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
GuiScreenEvent.BackgroundDrawnEvent, GuiScreenEvent.DrawScreenEvent, GuiScreenEvent.InitGuiEvent, GuiScreenEvent.KeyboardCharTypedEvent, GuiScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyEvent, GuiScreenEvent.MouseInputEvent, GuiScreenEvent.PotionShiftEvent
public class GuiScreenEvent
extends net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event

Fired on different events/actions when a Screen is active and visible. See the various subclasses for listening to different events.

These events is fired on the main Forge event bus, only on the logical client.

This class is annotated with @OnlyIn(Dist.CLIENT).

See Also:
GuiScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyEvent

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.BackgroundDrawnEvent
    Fired directly after the background of the Screen is drawn.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.DrawScreenEvent
    Fired when a Screen is being drawn.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.InitGuiEvent
    Fired when a Screen is being initialized.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.KeyboardCharTypedEvent
    Fired when a keyboard key corresponding to a character is typed.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyEvent
    Fired whenever a keyboard key is pressed or released.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyPressedEvent
    Fired when a keyboard key is pressed.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyReleasedEvent
    Fired when a keyboard key is released.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.MouseClickedEvent
    Fired when a mouse button is clicked.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.MouseDragEvent
    Fired when the mouse was dragged while a button is being held down.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.MouseInputEvent
    Fired whenever an action is performed by the mouse.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.MouseReleasedEvent
    Fired when a mouse button is released.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.MouseScrollEvent
    Fired when the mouse was dragged while a button is being held down.
    static class  GuiScreenEvent.PotionShiftEvent
    Fired when there are potion effects to be rendered and the Screen is being shifted.
